title: The Embodied Man
subtitle: A complete curriculum for masculine development
description: A comprehensive 12-week program integrating body, mind, and soul for men ready to do the deep work. This flagship course covers nervous system mastery, shadow integration, emotional depth, purpose, and embodied presence. Not for beginners—this is for men ready to transform.

modules.title: Foundations of Embodiment
modules.description: Moving from head to body—where real power lives

modules.title: Nervous System Mastery for Men
modules.description: Regulation, resilience, and the capacity to hold more

modules.title: The Masculine Shadow
modules.description: What you've disowned and why it's running your life

modules.title: Reclaiming Your Aggression
modules.description: From suppression or explosion to healthy power

modules.title: Integrating the Four Archetypes
modules.description: King, Warrior, Magician, Lover in practice

modules.title: Clarifying Purpose and Mission
modules.description: What you're here to do and how to do it

modules.title: Cultivating Masculine Presence
modules.description: Being fully here—in body, mind, and spirit

modules.title: Relationships and Polarity
modules.description: Showing up fully in intimate partnership

modules.title: The Integrated Man
modules.description: Bringing it all together for lasting transformation

whatYouLearn: Master your nervous system for unshakeable presence
Integrate your shadow and stop unconscious patterns
Heal father wounds at the root
Reclaim healthy aggression and protective power
Develop genuine emotional depth and intelligence
Clarify your purpose and take aligned action
Show up fully in relationships with embodied presence
Access all four masculine archetypes consciously
requirements: Commitment to 12 weeks of consistent practice

questions.question: What does 'embodiment' mean in the context of masculine development?
options: Living from and through the body rather than just the mind

questions.question: Why is nervous system regulation foundational for men's work?
options: A regulated system allows access to deeper work without overwhelm or shutdown

questions.question: What is the masculine shadow typically composed of?
options: Traits deemed unacceptable: vulnerability, rage, sensitivity, neediness

questions.question: How does the father wound typically manifest in adult men?
options: Struggles with authority, self-worth, knowing what you want, or becoming your father

questions.question: What is healthy masculine aggression?
options: Life force energy channeled for protection, creation, and pursuing purpose

questions.question: What does masculine presence require?
options: Grounded embodiment, emotional regulation, and full attention in the moment

questions.question: Why is brotherhood important for masculine development?
options: Men need witnessing, challenge, and support from other men to fully mature

questions.question: What does integration mean in the context of this course?
options: Bringing all aspects of self into coherent wholeness across body, mind, and purpose
